article_title: Libertarian Writings that Read Like Comic Books
article_text: Paul Buchheit teaches economic inequality at DePaul University. He is the founder and developer of the Web sites UsAgainstGreed.org, PayUpNow.org and RappingHistory.org, and the editor and main author of "American Wars: Illusions and Realities" (Clarity Press). He can be reached at [email protected].

article_metadata.description: Robert Reich recently noted that people without arguments often resort to personal attacks. They also resort to pleasant-sounding nonsense.

og.description: Robert Reich recently noted that people without arguments often resort to personal attacks. They also resort to pleasant-sounding nonsense.
